messages.message: On https://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com/ when I add a new file to a Converse project it doesn’t show an indication that a file is being added. It used to show the new file name and a spinner on the left. Now it looks like nothing happened until the file gets processed

Thanks @Sławek Biel for bringing it up.

We are aware of this and will be deploying a fix in a day or two.

https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C04TSMWLPAS/p1705934884102769

cc: @Prakhar
